project_abstract.cdata: The Yangtze Dike Strengthening Project aims to enhance the protection of the river bank against erosion and to improve critical sections of existing main dikes along the banks of the mid-Yantgze River in Hunan and Hubei Provinces, thus protecting the properties and lives behind the dikes against floods. There are eight project components: 1) River bank and dike fountain seepage protection will support river protection works. 2) Dike strengthening for Hubei and Hunan Provinces will support dike rehabilitation and seepage control, and cross-dike structures rehabilitation and replacement. 3) Dike monitoring and river modeling will set up a computerized system to monitor the seepage through the dike and settlement/deformation of the dike. 4) Equipment for dike maintenance will provide modern equipment for dike maintenance. 5) Resettlement will implement various housing and economic restoration measures to accommodate the 10,958 families affected. 6) Environmental management will support environmental measures detailed in the Environmental Management Plan. 7) Engineering and project management provides for the preparation of final designs and bidding documentation of the project works and construction supervision. 8) Institutional development, and flood prevention and disaster mitigation will provide technical assistance and training.

P064730.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>长江干堤加固项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目将保护长江护岸防止水流淘蚀，加固现有干堤重点地段，保护湖南、湖北两省7500万人民的生命财产免受洪水危害。项目主要内容包括加固长江护岸和防洪干堤，改造排洪闸门和交叉建筑物，为干堤运行维护提供防洪设施，加强省市两级的运行维护能力，扩充干堤监测系统，建立应急准备系统，通过向受益人收取防洪保安费解决干堤运行维护资金需求。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
